experience.title: Founders Office - Community and Strategic Initiatives
experience.description: I am working closely with the founder and CEO.Scouting investors for pre-series A round, govt grantsManaged the biggest software testing community and launched a new community for paid learners.Built a full-fledged community leaderboard to measure the contribution of the community members.Helped to get sponsorship for the biggest flagship event Testflix 12k Dollars worth.

experience.title: Creator
experience.description: Making it easier to understand India as a market.

experience.title: Creator
experience.description: Oceans is an exclusive community of India's top VC and PE investors. Our goal is to create an environment where our members feel comfortable seeking different perspectives, gaining deeper insights about Indian markets through osmosis, and unlocking collaboration opportunities with each other.We have ~110+ interesting folks already from 85+ Venture Capital and Private Equity firms such as Beenext, Westbridge Capital, Guild Capital, Steadview Capital, Peak XV, Waterbridge Ventures, Kalaari Capital, Chiratae Ventures, and Prosus Ventures among others.Most of them have a strong area where they can add value varying from GTM, Valuations, Finance, Hiring, and Diligence across Fintech, eCom, Healthcare, Climatech, and Retail.
experience.description_html: Oceans is an exclusive community of India's top VC and PE investors. Our goal is to create an environment where our members feel comfortable seeking different perspectives, gaining deeper insights about Indian markets through osmosis, and unlocking collaboration opportunities with each other.We have ~110+ interesting folks already from 85+ Venture Capital and Private Equity firms such as Beenext, Westbridge Capital, Guild Capital, Steadview Capital, Peak XV, Waterbridge Ventures, Kalaari Capital, Chiratae Ventures, and Prosus Ventures among others.Most of them have a strong area where they can add value varying from GTM, Valuations, Finance, Hiring, and Diligence across Fintech, eCom, Healthcare, Climatech, and Retail.

experience.title: Community Manager
experience.description: Received an award for the building best cohort-based community Shifted the whole community from Slack to Discord.Coordinated and executed successful *offline events in 3+ cities in a single day.*Improved onboarding experience by more than 4 times *(from 5% to 22%)*, with a monthly active user rate of 60%.Boosted conversation rate through community events by 9% and consistently achieved 2.5x monthly targets

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Raised funds, and built a team of 10+ high-performing members.Built a community of 3000+ active members who practice mindfulness on a daily basis.Orchestrated 150+ events including paid ones, across various communities impacting 50000+ members.Partnered up with 70+ psychologists helping 1200+ people get the right kind of mental health.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: Conducted in-depth analysis & survey of 600+ accidents in India studying reasons, demographics, and probable solutions.Built a product that helps patients reach faster hospitals by scanning a QR code in vehicle key-chain & stickers.Raised funds and incubated at a university entrepreneurship cell catering to a $29+ billion market(TAM).

experience.title: Outreach Head
experience.description: Raised sponsorship for 10+ events from companies like BMW, Renault, Redbull, Upgrad, and Burger King.Spearheaded a team of 16+ members winning 1st position in Asia’s biggest Entrepreneurship event at IIT Bombay.Served as the university’s outreach head, liaising with 71+ colleges across Jaipur.
